alert.note: Alert for Rockingham (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 05 at 2:41PM EDT until August 05 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR CENTRAL ROCKINGHAM COUNTY... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. High water has been reported in the Singers Glen area. The heaviest rain has ended, but it will take time for the excessive rainfall to run off down area streams. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Broadway... Singers Glen... Cherry Grove... Sparkling Springs... FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
